9eeae198-b563-41be-9da5-c68303fdaac2.description: Saint Mary's has partnered with Knack to create the Graduate Peer Tutor badge. Earners of this badge have been trained in the best practices of peer-to-peer tutoring for adult learners, including how to create a friendly, safe environment in the tutoring session, how to maintain tutoring records to ensure confidentiality, how to employ a variety of learning strategies to assist students in becoming independent learners, and how to assess a students’ progress throughout tutoring sessions.
9eeae198-b563-41be-9da5-c68303fdaac2.name: Graduate Peer Tutor

issuer.summary: issued by Saint Mary’s University of Minnesota

badge_template_activities.title: Provided individual and/or small group tutoring to improve academic performance; identified the educational needs of individual students; demonstrated active listening to ensure the students’ questions were understood and addressed; encouraged active learning to provide both hands-on experience and immediate feedback in the learning process

7b71a088-3fc7-4e2d-9e3d-94563256557f.description: Saint Mary's badge in Python Programming focuses on core programming concepts such as classes and objects, controlling flow, user input, batch processing, and error handling while working in the context of data processing, analysis, & visualization. Earners develop custom visualizations that communicate data and results of an analysis, respond to specific scripting requirements to address analytical problems & improve workflows, & apply the logic of data science for object-oriented programming.
7b71a088-3fc7-4e2d-9e3d-94563256557f.name: Python Programming for Technology Applications
